ygData.subject: Re: Good loot
ygData.msgSnippet: I suggest leaving the Qeynos area.  I ventured over to Freeport with some other level 8 s and I have had a much better time leveling and getting money on the
ygData.messageBody:
I suggest leaving the Qeynos area. I ventured over to
Freeport with some other level 8's and I have had a
much better time leveling and getting money on the
other side of the continent. I also found grouping
was a lot better. It seems the Freeport area
appreciates Wizards a bit more then players in the
Qeynos area.

Verin
Karana Server

--- Philippe Fuentes <pfuentes@...> wrote:
> From: Philippe Fuentes <pfuentes@...>
>
>
> I have a little problem, hop you could help me out,
>
>
> I'm and Erudit , I reached lvl 8 yesterday and I
> can't buy any spell lvl 3
> cause I miss money. Everything I kill don't give
> me enough money.
> I'm hunting around Queynos Hill, BB, West Karana
> and I barely reach 60
> gold in bank, I really don't see how to make more
> money and lvl 3 spells
> are something like 4 or 5 platinum.
>
> can you give me any advice on how to make more money
> disgarding XP for now.
> I was told the Kerra Islan is a good place so I made
> the trip back to erudin
> but I couldn't find anybody in the Island and nobody
> at Erudin to organize a
> group to the Island. It seems like nobody knows
> Kerra ...
>
> Thank you in advance for your help
>
> Massue, Erudin WIZ lvl 8
>
